articles.description: Britain's Tyson Fury says Oleksandr Usyk is too small to compete with him in their undisputed heavyweight world title fight in May.
articles.title: Tyson Fury says Oleksandr Usyk is too small to beat elite heavyweights

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Rodri says he is planning to take a break during the season run-in as the club chase a second successive Treble.
articles.title: I need a rest - Man City midfielder Rodri

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp says he hopes "nothing gets between us and the supporters" amid a fan protest about the club's ticket price rise.
articles.title: I hope nothing gets between us - Klopp on fan protest

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp says injured trio Trent Alexander-Arnold, Allison and Diogo Jota are back in training.
articles.title: Injured Liverpool trio train before Atalanta tie

articles.description: The swimming leg of the triathlon could be cancelled if heavy rain affects water quality in the River Seine, says Paris 2024 president Tony Estanguet.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Triathlon swimming could be cancelled because of poor water quality

articles.description: The ever-reliable Rachel Daly will probably only now receive the plaudits she deserves after retiring from England duty.
articles.title: Underappreciated Daly leaves England mark as she retires

articles.description: Thomas Tuchel says Bayern Munich were denied a penalty by a "kid's mistake", while one pundit describes Arsenal not being awarded a spot-kick as "quite alarming".
articles.title: 'A kid's mistake' - were Arsenal and Bayern denied clear penalties?

articles.description: Darts players and diehard Manchester United fans Luke Littler and Nathan Aspinall use their skills to rank eleven football legends.
articles.title: Man Utd superfans Littler and Aspinall rank football legends

articles.description: Gaelic footballer turned New Orleans Saints kicker Charlie Smyth sits down with The GAA Social after earning a three-year contract with the NFL team.
articles.title: NFL: Charlie Smyth wants to shine on world stage after earning New Orleans Saints deal

articles.description: The Masters: Will Rory McIlroy finally win at Augusta?
articles.title: The Masters: Will Rory McIlroy finally win at Augusta?
